name: Demo Game
title:
===================
**** DEMO GAME ****
===================
description: This is a demo game. This game was not created via the Compiler, but was created manually. It is a simple game that demonstrates the basic features of the game engine. Lets dive right in!

rooms.name: Room 1
rooms.title: The First Room - The spawm room
rooms.description: This is the first room in the game.

rooms.name: Room 2
rooms.title: East Room
rooms.description: This is the second room in the game. It is a simple room with a door to the west.

rooms.name: Room 3
rooms.title: West Room
rooms.description: This is the third room in the game. It is a simple room with a door to the east.

rooms.name: Room 4
rooms.title: North room
rooms.description: This is the fourth room in the game. It is a simple room with a door to the south.
